script
start !style_error(Unknown construction message:) Exception: scriptTable_1_0 devicemanagement Test not run


Narrative

As OSGP I want to set the owner of a device

Scenario: successfully set owner

scenario success input values device originalorganisation neworganisation
given a device @device with owner @originalorganisation
and a valid set owner request with device @device and neworganisation @neworganisation
when the set owner request is received on OSGP
then the device's owner is updated to @neworganisation
and the set owner response is returned

success input values
device originalorganisation neworganisation
device1 Heerlen Politie
scenario success input values device originalorganisation neworganisation
given The instance scriptTableActor.given. does not exist a device device1 with owner Heerlen
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist a valid set owner request with device device1 and neworganisation Politie
when The instance scriptTableActor.when. does not exist the set owner request is received on OSGP
then The instance scriptTableActor.then. does not exist the device's owner is updated to Politie
and The instance scriptTableActor.and. does not exist the set owner response is returned
